column1: text
What are things that men do that show they are insecure in their masculinity in your mind?

What are some simple “rules” you and your partner set for a better relationship?


For example “I load the dishwasher, you unload the dishwasher” or “we take a 10 minute time out if our conversation gets heated”..... etc!
What are some stupid things your SO does that you find funny?
For those who ended up in a great relationship with someone who wasn’t necessarily “your type” but was “just what you needed - what’s your story?
What does a healthy relationship look like? How does it feel? What behaviours does it include?

What was your “I deserve better than this” moment?


Whether it be work, romantic, platonic, family or even how you treat yourself.
What are some 'girl rules' that are unsaid but followed?

Poor & Working Class Women, what are some things your middle class & upper, etc friends or family just do not understand?


[removed]
What is the weirdest thing you do in the name of saving money?

Where would you place your pet(s) on the intellect spectrum?


My male dog just snitched on my husband for leaving a wet towel on his spot on the bed.
What's an 'oh shit' moment where you realised you've been doing something the wrong way for years?

What is the most insulting thing a boss has ever said to you?

Looking for recommendations of online stores, but any tips are welcome 

Also please don't say the kids section lol

Let’s rave about the good in our lives.

Optional: What convinced you that this is THE ONE?
